snippet: Tornado Alicia Black, 14, of Boca Raton, Fla., won her first-round match in the United States Open junior girls tournament with a bandaged left thigh and a stiff back that required a trainer's assistance. She suggested she had an additional burden:...
abstract: Tornado Alicia Black, 14, of Boca Raton, Fla., won her first-round match in the United States Open junior girls tournament with a bandaged left thigh and a stiff back that required a trainer's assistance. She suggested she had an additional burden: her name.

headline.main: With First-Round Open Juniors Victory, Less Teasing by the Other Kids
